attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current labour government has successfully alienated the hard working, middle-class and working-class citizen which it tried so hard to impress. It's gone against the people with the 10p tax row, fuel taxation, removing prisoners first pay-rise for a decade, the 42 day terror law, car-tax increases, HIPs - which are all forcing commerical failure and economic crisis for working voters. Call a general election and let the people decide who they want.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
